card_metadata.id: Unique identifier for the card context record in the database.
card_metadata.headline: A catchy, short (max 5 words) headline summarizing the user's current focus or vibe.
card_metadata.subheadline: The user's Farcaster handle or FID (e.g., @fid_402755) for identification.
card_metadata.summary_line: A concise, single-sentence summary of the user's persona and core activity.
card_metadata.stats: Array of 3 core metrics optimized for the card design. Includes '{ label: string, value: string }'. Defaults to: 'Casts/30d', 'Avg likes', 'Followers'.
card_metadata.badges: Identity & Role labels (Who they are). Array of max 3 short strings (e.g., 'Base Builder', 'Runner'). Max 20 chars per badge.
card_metadata.topics: Content & Interest labels (What they talk about). Array of max 3 very short strings (e.g., 'Web3 dev', 'Base'). Max 20 chars per topic.
card_metadata.activity_pattern: Categorized posting behavior derived from analytics (e.g., 'daily_active', 'occasional').
card_metadata.active_since: Estimated start date of the user's Farcaster journey in 'YYYY-MM' format.
card_metadata.featured_casts: Array of exactly 3 notable casts selected for high engagement and brand alignment. Each includes 'hash', 'url', 'text' (excerpt), 'likes', and a 'reason' (AI's analysis of why it matches the persona).
